entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023
